    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    Generic DAO class for CRUD operations using reflection.
    AddressValidator
    Validator class to verify that the address field of a Client object is not null and has a minimum length of 5 characters.
    Bill
    Immutable Bill record representing an entry in the Log table.
    BillDAO
    DAO class for Bill entity.
    BillWindowController
    Controller for the Bill (receipt) window.
    Client
    The model class for the client with id, name, email, and address.
    ClientBLL
    Business logic layer for operations with the Client class.
    ClientDAO
    DAO class for Client entity.
    ClientsWindowController
    Controller for managing clients in the graphical user interface Allows adding, deleting, editing, and viewing clients
    ConnectionFactory
     
    EmailValidators
    Validator class to verify the email address format of a Client object.
    HelloApplication
    Main JavaFX application class that loads and shows the main window.
    HelloController
    Controller class for handling UI interactions in the hello view.
    MainController
    Controller for the main window, it handles opening different management windows: Clients, Products, and Orders.
    NameValidator
    Validator for the Client name.
    Order
    Represents an order made by a client for a product with a specified quantity.
    OrderBLL
    Business logic for handling orders.
    OrderDAO
    DAO class for Order entity.
    OrdersWindowController
    Controller for the Order placement window, it allows selecting client and product, entering quantity, and placing orders.
    PriceValidator
    Validates that the price of a product is not negative.
    Product
    Represents a product with id, name, quantity, and price.
    ProductBLL
    Business logic layer for managing products in the database
    ProductDAO
    DAO class for Product entity.
    ProductNameValidator
    Validator for the Product name.
    ProductsWindowController
    Controller for managing products, it allows adding, editing, deleting products and viewing them in a TableView.
    QuantityValidator
    Validator for product quantity, to make sure it is zero or positive.
    Validator<T>
    Generic interface for validating objects.
